explanations.reason: The paper focuses on the relationship between managerial ability and firms' external financing, specifically examining how managerial ability influences the choice between loan and equity financing. The study employs traditional econometric methods such as yearly regression, change analysis, quantile regression, and instrumental variable approaches to address endogeneity. There is no mention or implication of any machine learning techniques, neural networks, or related methodologies in the abstract or title. Therefore, none of the provided keywords are relevant to this paper.
